content: Utilizing an ephemeris, an astronomer can calculate lunar phases and the times of rising and setting of the sun and of the moon all around the world and for any day of the year.
translations: ita:Utilizzando effemeridi, un astronomo pu√≤ calcolare le fasi lunari e l'ora del sorgere e tramonto del sole e della luna i
